section.name: Installing SOD
section.p: SOD is currently distributed in tar and zip formats. Both contain the same content, but we want to keep everyone happy. At this point if all of these things came out of the distribution, SOD is officiallly installed. If you're not too worn out by the heavy lifting involved in unpacking SOD, now might be a good time to go on to the walkthrough to see various neat things SOD can do.
